name: CbcSimpleInteger

algorithms.name:
Floor/Ceiling Integer Branching
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcIntegerBranchingObject: Standard floor/ceiling branch on integer x:
- Down arm: lb <= x <= floor(x*)
- Up arm: ceil(x*) <= x <= ub

CbcSimpleInteger: CbcObject for integer variables.
Creates CbcIntegerBranchingObject instances.

Also supports one-way branching for fixing variables.

see:
CbcBranchingObject for branching action base

Edwin 11/9/2009 carved out of CbcBranchActual
